EmailTemplate.name: Post DocuSign access
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Good day!
A DocuSign license has been assigned to you.
You must have received an email with a link to activate your Docusign license. Kindly follow the steps mentioned in that email.
Let me know if I can assist you with anything else.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Salesforce Configuration Team
